name: Neon Rush (loni852)
description:
Neon Rush is a plataformer focused on killing bosses with some little pieces of rougelite mechanics and a fast gameplay.

This was made for an academy final project, so don´t expect a long game, please leave feedback or any idea you get playing so we can learn to do better.

Controlls = Keyboard / Controller

Diagonal = Shift / LB

Slowmo = F / RB

Movement = WASD / Joystick

Fire = J / X

Jump = K / A Button
